they are additive or multiplicative and whether they should be dampened, must be speciÔ¨Åed

5.3.6 Implementing ETS Models
In Chapter 12 we will look at how to develop a reusable framework for automatically grid
searching the hyperparameters for the ETS model on a range of standard univariate time
series forecasting problems. You can adapt and reuse this framework on your own time series
